video-block.title: Live
video-block.start-stream: Until the start of the broadcast

about-church-block.description: Welcome! You found the church you were looking for! Welcome!

church-team-block.text: Church leadership is carried out by a team of dedicated ministers who work diligently for the development of God's Kingdom.

serving-god-block.title: Ministry
serving-god-block.text: The importance of various ministries in our church is hard to overestimate. Each minister brings their talents and calling to the community, creating a diverse and multifaceted environment for spiritual growth and service to the community. From pastors and teachers who deeply reveal the Word of God, to the guest service and prayer team that monitors spiritual needs, each contribution is an integral part of our collective. Whether it's serving the community, raising a new generation of believers, or supporting those in need - all these ministries together form our united calling to serve God and people together.

share-block.title: Share
share-block.text: Share joy and hope by supporting our ministry! Your donations help build a strong community where every soul finds its place. Bless and be blessed!

write-us-block.text: We are always here to provide you with support and answer your questions. Write to us if you need spiritual support, advice or prayer, or if you have any other questions. Your needs are our priority, and we are always ready to be here for you.

success.title: Sent!
success.text:
Thank you for writing to us. Expect
a response to your email. We will
respond to you soon. Blessings!

error.title: Failure!
error.text:
Unfortunately something went wrong.
Please try again later.

description-block.text-1: The "Source of Life" Church is a growing community of believers who want to be an expression of Christ in this world and fulfill His mission for the spread of God's Kingdom. For this purpose, we conduct regular services, prayer meetings, and educational classes. Events are organized for children, youth, families, and seniors, where everyone can receive spiritual support, strengthen their faith, and find new friends.
description-block.text-2: Our goal is to create a space for growth where every parishioner feels part of a large loving family. In all our activities, we strive to be a balanced and relevant community, building our beliefs on the authority of the Bible.

church-page.preview-block: Welcome! You found the church you were looking for! Welcome!

jesus-page.prayer-1: Jesus Christ is the Son of God who came to earth to die for our sins and rise again for our justification.
jesus-page.prayer-2: By accepting Him as our Savior, we receive forgiveness of sins and the gift of eternal life.
jesus-page.prayer-3: The path to salvation begins with acknowledging our sins, sincere repentance, and faith in Jesus Christ.
jesus-page.prayer-4: Open your heart to God, accept His love, and you will find peace and joy that come only through Christ.
jesus-page.prayer-5:
Prayer of Repentance

Dear Jesus, I repent of all my sins, for I know that I have done wrong by living without You. I ask You for forgiveness, and I believe that You are the one who forgives. I accept Your love and grace to me and ask that You be my Lord and Savior. Help me to believe in You, love You, and live for You. In Jesus' name, amen.
jesus-page.prayer-6:
"For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life."
John 3:16
jesus-page.prayer-7:
"If you declare with your mouth, 'Jesus is Lord,' and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved."
Romans 10:9-10

preview.title: Ministry
preview.text: The importance of various ministries in our church is hard to overestimate. Each minister brings their talents and calling to the community, creating a diverse and multifaceted environment for spiritual growth and service to the community. From pastors and teachers who deeply reveal the Word of God, to the guest service and prayer team that monitors spiritual needs, each contribution is an integral part of our collective. Whether it's serving the community, raising a new generation of believers, or supporting those in need - all these ministries together form our united calling to serve God and people together.

button.button-main-page: Go to Events and Blog section

homeGroups.title: Home Groups
homeGroups.text: Information about home groups. Join the community, share life and grow together in faith!

jesusBirthday.title: Jesus' Birthday
jesusBirthday.details: A real birthday celebration where Jesus is the birthday boy. Don't miss it! There will be a dress code and an awesome program, but more on that later üòâ

kairos.title: Kairos Course 2025
kairos.text: An interactive course for Christians who want to participate in God's work in the world. It covers biblical mission, history, strategy, and cultural barriers. Find your calling in God's global plan!
kairos.lastDay: üìÖ Today, November 9 ‚Äî last day to register!

skiTrip.title: Winter Ski Trip
skiTrip.description: Important! This is not a camp, but a great opportunity for those who want to spend time together, relax, ski, and socialize
skiTrip.whatWeDo: From us - We book accommodation with meals.

christmasHero.title: Bring Christmas to a Fallen Hero's Family
christmasHero.text: If you would like to join:
christmasHero.step1Text: Write in direct messages or put a ¬´+¬ª under this post.
christmasHero.step2Text: In response, you will receive all necessary information about the child's age, gender, wishes, and address
christmasHero.step4Text: Send it to the specified address before Christmas
christmasHero.note: P.S. If you are abroad, you can send funds, and we will prepare and send the gift on your behalf.

prayer.title: Prayer
prayer.botText: Our chat has a prayer bot where you can leave your prayer request. The community will pray for you!
prayer.hereText: This is a special time when ministers are waiting by the stage, ready to pray with you. You don't have to have a special need ‚Äî you can come for a blessing prayer for the next week.
prayer.schedule: üìÖ Every last Tuesday of the month

membership.title: Membership/Water Baptism
membership.text: If you are not yet a member of our church or have not been water baptized as an adult, we encourage you to take this important step. Sign up by calling the church number, and we will be happy to guide you through this process.

donations.title: Donations & Tithes
donations.text: Tithes and donations are how church members support God's work. Guests and visitors are also welcome to contribute if they wish, but it is completely voluntary.

heartForTheHouse.title: Heart for the House
heartForTheHouse.essenceText: "Heart for the House" is a special act of generosity when church members come together for extraordinary donations for the development of the church and its ministries. This is an expression of love, gratitude and faith, not a regular tithe or regular donation.
heartForTheHouse.goalText: Funds collected during "Heart for the House" will be directed as the first contribution to the Church Building Project fund!
heartForTheHouse.ideaText: "It's not about money ‚Äî it's about the heart." Heart for the House is an opportunity to show that our heart belongs to God's house, and we believe in its impact on this world.
heartForTheHouse.whenText: You can make your generous donations on Sunday (November 9) at the end of each of the 3 streams in cash, or by the details below.
heartForTheHouse.receiver: Receiver name: RO CHURCH SOURCE OF LIFE
heartForTheHouse.contact: Information and details in foreign currency by phone 0738003737.

ministry.title: Ministry Here
ministry.text: If you are a church member, one of your privileges is the opportunity to serve God in our community. Follow the link to learn more about current ministries, leave your contacts and get involved.

cafe.title: Church Cafe
cafe.text: After the service, we invite you to our church cafe. It's a great opportunity to chat, meet new people and spend time in the warm atmosphere of the community.
